author: senh
title: Tracy Morgan Crash: Multiple Causes Cited
text: BING NEWS: Tracy Morgan Crash: Driver Fatigue, Unused Seat Belts Cited as Causes WASHINGTON -- U.S. transportation regulators on Tuesday cited multiple factors behind last year's crash involving comedian Tracy Morgan and a Wal-Mart truck that killed one person and injured others, including driver fatigue and unused seat belts. 08/11/2015 - 3:41 am | View Link U.S. cites driver fatigue, lack of seat belt use in Tracy Morgan crash WASHINGTON, Aug 11 (Reuters) - U.S. transportation regulators on Tuesday cited multiple factors behind last year's crash in New Jersey involving comedian Tracy Morgan and a Wal-Mart truck that killed one person and injured others, pointing to driver ... 08/11/2015 - 3:38 am | View Link Tracy Morgan Crash: Driver Fatigue, Unused Seat Belts Were Factors (Watch NTSB Hearing Live) NTSB Chairman Christopher Hart said in a statement Aug. 11 opening a hearing into the crash. Unused seat belts also were a factor, it said. Morgan, a former star on NBC’s “Saturday Night Live” and “30 Rock,” suffered multiple facial fractures ... 08/11/2015 - 3:35 am | View Link Walmart Driver Was Awake More Than 28 Hours Before Tracy Morgan Crash: NTSB He pleaded not guilty. The crash left Morgan, then 45, in critical condition, with multiple broken bones and a traumatic brain injury. Since then, the comedian has “struggled” to regain his old self, his lawyer said. In a June 2015 interview with ... 08/11/2015 - 3:23 am | View Link U.S. cites lack of seat belts, emergency exits in Tracy Morgan crash WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. transportation regulators on Tuesday cited multiple factors behind last year's crash involving comedian Tracy Morgan and a Wal-Mart truck that killed one person and injured others, including driver fatigue and unused seat belts.
